page.title: 14A DAY AT MR.SMITHS FARMS
page.content: My day begins at 6.00am.First I have a cup of tea.Then start work by putting cake in the manger for the cows,putting the milk equipment together,and fetching the cows from the field.From 6.45 to 8.00am we milk the cows.After breakfast(8.30am)I take the cows back to the field,clean out the milking sheds and equipment,feed the heifer,bull and calves and put straw down.At 10.30am I have coffee and then do either field work or maintanance work.After dinner more field work is done.Then we fetch some grass to the yard for the cows.At about 4.30pm we wash out the bulk tank often the milk has been collected.At 5.30pm milking begins again and the shed cleaned up.I finish work about 7.30-8.00pm.
